entry.name: Exp-All App Traffic
entry.caption: Exp-All App Traffic
entry.description: query i.e. (app eq google-drive-web)

entry.name: Exp-URL-Example
entry.query: (app eq youtube-base) and (url contains '/watch')
entry.caption: Exp-URL-Example

entry.name: Exp-Vulnerability-Exempt
entry.query: (subtype eq vulnerability) and ( (severity eq critical) or ( severity eq high ) ) and ( (threatid neq 41002) and (threatid neq 41005) and (threatid neq 41010) and (threatid neq 41001) and (threatid neq 41000) and (threatid neq 42000))
entry.caption: Exp-Vulnerability-Exempt
entry.description: Example of vulnerability report with omissions

entry.name: Threat Check
entry.caption: Threat Check
entry.query: (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Verification report - chk against directional based

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Malicious Sites
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Malicious Sites
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)
entry.description: Traffic destined for URL categories - CnC, Hacking, or Phishing

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Threat Cats
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Threat Cats
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq parked) or (category eq unknown)
entry.description: Traffic destined for URL categories - DDns, Parked, or Unknown

entry.name: WildFire Malicious Verdicts
entry.caption: WildFire Malicious Verdicts
entry.query: (verdict eq malicious) or (verdict eq phishing)
entry.description: All WildFire verdicts that are either malicious or phishing

entry.name: WildFire verdicts SMTP
entry.caption: WildFire verdicts SMTP
entry.query: (app eq smtp)
entry.description: All WildFire verdicts where application identified as SMTP

entry.name: Clients sinkholed
entry.caption: Clients sinkholed
entry.description: Traffic leaving network destined to Sinkhole address

entry.name: Used Rules
entry.caption: Used Rules
entry.query: (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: All rules being used

entry.name: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.caption: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and ((app eq incomplete) or (app eq insufficient-data) or (app eq not-applicable) or (action eq deny) or (action eq drop))
entry.description: Optional: What is trying to access internal servers. Not scheduled.

entry.name: Inbound Used Rules
entry.caption: Inbound Used Rules
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Rules being used by traffic sourced from Internet

entry.name: Inbound Traffic - All
entry.caption: Inbound Traffic - All
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: This is used to determine bytes and session for traffic for use in report. Delete after Assessment

entry.name: Inbound Traffic - SSL
entry.caption: Inbound Traffic - SSL
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app eq ssl)
entry.description: This is used to determine bytes and session for SSL for use in report. Delete after Assessment.

entry.name: Inbound Insufficient Data-Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Insufficient Data-Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app eq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Internet traffic where application not determined (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable)

entry.name: Inbound Rules wURL Filtering
entry.caption: Inbound Rules wURL Filtering
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Inbound Rules should not use URL Filtering

entry.name: Inbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) and (direction eq client-to-server)
entry.description: Internet Clients Uploading Files to your network

entry.name: Inbound Source Countries
entry.caption: Inbound Source Countries
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Source Countries initiating successful connections

entry.name: Inbound Source Countries-App
entry.caption: Inbound Source Countries-App
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Source Countries initiating successful connections to your network and the Apps they are using

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses allow into your network from the Internet

entry.name: Inbound Denied Viruses
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Viruses
entry.query: ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus)) and ((zone.src eq INTERNET) or (zone.src eq EXT-INTERNET_V6)) and (action neq alert)
entry.description: Viruses successfully denied from entering your network

entry.name: Inbound Rules wThreat
entry.caption: Inbound Rules wThreat
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Inbound Rules allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities.

entry.name: Inbound Threat by SRC IP
entry.caption: Inbound Threat by SRC IP
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3))) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (severity geq low)
entry.description: Inbound Rules allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities

entry.name: Inbound Threat by DST IP
entry.caption: Inbound Threat by DST IP
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Inbound Rules allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities

entry.name: Inbound FileTypes to WildFire
entry.caption: Inbound FileTypes to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: File Types coming from the Internet that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Inbound Apps to WildFire
entry.caption: Inbound Apps to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: File Types coming from the Internet that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Inbound Rules to WildFire
entry.caption: Inbound Rules to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Inbound Rules coming from the Internet that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) and ((action eq allow) or (action eq alert)) and (subtype eq spyware)
entry.description: Spyware allowed in from the Internet

entry.name: Inbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) and ((action neq allow) and (action neq alert)) and (subtype eq spyware)
entry.description: Spyware successfully blocked from entering your network

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Client on the Internet sending traffic to your network intended to exploit a vulnerability on your network.

entry.name: Inbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Vulnerabilties successfully denied from entering your network where traffic initiated external, attacker external

entry.name: Inbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Inbound Allowed Server-to-Client traffic where threat log type is classified - vulnerability

entry.name: Inbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Inbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and (direction eq server-to-client)
entry.description: Vulnerabilties successfully denied from entering your network where traffic initiated external, attacker internal

entry.name: Inbound URLs by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound URLs by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq continue) or (action eq override))
entry.description: Inbound Rules with URL Filtering applied

entry.name: Inbound Apps
entry.caption: Inbound Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data

entry.name: Inbound Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-IPs
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data - Source IP

entry.name: Inbound Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-Ports
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data - Destination Port

entry.name: Inbound Apps-Location
entry.caption: Inbound Apps-Location
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Traffic allowed inbound where application is classified - incomplete, not-applicable, or insufficient-data - Source Country

entry.name: Inbound Unknown Apps
entry.caption: Inbound Unknown Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and ((app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Internet traffic that cannot be determined (unknown-tcp, unknown-udp, unknown-p2p)

entry.name: Inbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.caption: Inbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (direction eq server-to-client)
entry.description: Internet Clients Downloading Files from your network

entry.name: Inbound File DNLD by RuleDetail
entry.caption: Inbound File DNLD by RuleDetail
entry.query: ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (srcloc neq 'US')
entry.description: Internet Clients Downloading Files from your network

entry.name: Internal Used Rules
entry.caption: Internal Used Rules
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable))
entry.description: Rules being used by traffic sourced from Internal

entry.name: Internal Rules wURL Filtering
entry.caption: Internal Rules wURL Filtering
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3))))
entry.description: Internal Rules should not use URL Filtering

entry.name: Internal File UPLD by Rule
entry.caption: Internal File UPLD by Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Internal Clients Uploading files from your network

entry.name: Internal Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: All internal allowed viruses and wildfire viruses

entry.name: Internal Denied Viruses
entry.caption: Internal Denied Viruses
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus))
entry.description: Viruses denied on your internal network

entry.name: Internal Rules wThreat
entry.caption: Internal Rules wThreat
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Internal Rules where internal traffic to any allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities.

entry.name: Internal Threat by SRC IP
entry.caption: Internal Threat by SRC IP
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Internal Rules allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities

entry.name: Brute Force All
entry.caption: Brute Force All
entry.query: (severity geq medium) and (category-of-threatid eq brute-force)
entry.description: Category brute-force medium or higher

entry.name: Internal Threat by DST IP
entry.caption: Internal Threat by DST IP
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Internal Rules allowing or denying viruses, spyware and vulnerabilities

entry.name: Internal FileTypes to WildFire
entry.caption: Internal FileTypes to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3))))
entry.description: File Types from-to internal traffic that are sent to WildFire

entry.name: InternalApps to WildFire
entry.caption: InternalApps to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3))))
entry.description: Identified Applications coming from Internal that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Internal Rules to WildFire
entry.caption: Internal Rules to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3))))
entry.description: Internal Rules coming from-to internal that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Internal Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (subtype eq spyware) and (severity geq medium) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Internal spyware sev greater than med allowed

entry.name: Internal Spyware by IP
entry.caption: Internal Spyware by IP
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (subtype eq spyware))
entry.description: Spyware traffic identified from-to internal

entry.name: Internal Denied Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Internal Denied Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (subtype eq spyware) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Internal Spyware Denied

entry.name: Internal Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Vulnerabilities allowed inside your network, attacker (client) and victim (server) internal

entry.name: Internal Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Internal Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Vulnerabilities successfully denied from inside your network where traffic initiated internal (client), attacker and victim internal

entry.name: Internal Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Internal Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Vulnerabilities allowed inside your network, attacker (server) and victim (client) internal

entry.name: Internal Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Internal Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Vulnerabilities successfully denied from inside your network where traffic initiated internal (server), attacker and victim internal

entry.name: Internal URLs
entry.caption: Internal URLs
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3))))
entry.description: Internal rules should not have URL filtering applied.

entry.name: Internal Apps
entry.caption: Internal Apps
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Internal applications by rule

entry.name: Internal Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Internal Apps-IPs
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Internal Apps by Rule w Src Addr

entry.name: Internal Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Internal Apps-Ports
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and (action eq allow) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (app neq insufficient-data)
entry.description: Internal Apps by Rule by Dst Port

entry.name: Internal Unknown Apps
entry.caption: Internal Unknown Apps
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Internal traffic not destined to Internet that cannot be determined (unknown-tcp, unknown-udp, unknown-p2p)

entry.name: Internal File DNLD by Rule
entry.caption: Internal File DNLD by Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3)))) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow))
entry.description: Internal clients downloading files from your network

entry.name: Outbound Used Rules
entry.caption: Outbound Used Rules
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Rules being used by traffic destined to Internet

entry.name: Outbound Traffic - All
entry.caption: Outbound Traffic - All
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: All Traffic destined to Internet (used for determining amount of SSL traffic by dividing bytes from this rule in Outbound traffic SSL)

entry.name: Outbound Traffic - SSL
entry.caption: Outbound Traffic - SSL
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app eq ssl)
entry.description: All SSL Traffic destined to Internet (used for determining amount of SSL traffic by dividing bytes from Outbound Traffic - All into this rule)

entry.name: Outbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.caption: Outbound File DNLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET)) or ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and ((addr.dst in 127.0.0.1) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.dst in 127.0.0.3))) or (((zone.src eq INTERNET) and ((addr.src in 127.0.0.1)) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.2) or (addr.src in 127.0.0.3))) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (direction eq server-to-client)
entry.description: Internal clients Downloading Files from the Internet

entry.name: Outbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.caption: Outbound Non-Working-Traffic
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and ((app eq incomplete) or (app eq insufficient-data) or (app eq not-applicable) or (action eq deny) or (action eq drop))
entry.description: Optional: What is trying to access external servers. Not scheduled.

entry.name: Outbound Web Apps
entry.caption: Outbound Web Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category neq any)
entry.description: Allowed applications from Internal to Internet where application is not (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable) that is not in category any

entry.name: Outbound Web Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Outbound Web Apps-IPs
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category neq any)
entry.description: Allowed applications from Internal to Internet where application is not (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable) that is not in category any, by IP

entry.name: Outbound NonWeb Apps-IPs
entry.caption: Outbound NonWeb Apps-IPs
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category eq any)
entry.description: Allowed applications to Internet not identified as (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable) in any category, by IP

entry.name: Outbound Web Apps-Location
entry.caption: Outbound Web Apps-Location
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category neq any)
entry.description: Allowed applications from Internal to Internet where application is not (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable) that is not in category any, by Destination Country

entry.name: Outbound NonWeb Apps-Location
entry.caption: Outbound NonWeb Apps-Location
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category eq any)
entry.description: Allowed applications to Internet not identified as (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable) in any category, by Destination Country

entry.name: Outbound NonWeb Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Outbound NonWeb Apps-Ports
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category eq any)
entry.description: Allowed applications to Internet not identified as (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable) in any category, by Destination Port

entry.name: Outbound Web Apps-Ports
entry.caption: Outbound Web Apps-Ports
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category neq any)
entry.description: Allowed applications from Internal to Internet where application is not (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable) that is not in category any, by Destination Port

entry.name: Outbound NonWeb Apps
entry.caption: Outbound NonWeb Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (category eq any)
entry.description: Allowed applications to Internet not identified as (insufficient-data, incomplete, or not-applicable) in any category

entry.name: Outbound Unknown Apps Detailed
entry.caption: Outbound Unknown Apps Detailed
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (( app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Internet traffic destined to Internet that cannot be determined (unknown-tcp, unknown-udp, unknown-p2p)

entry.name: Outbound Unknown Apps
entry.caption: Outbound Unknown Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (( app eq unknown-tcp) or (app eq unknown-udp) or ( app eq unknown-p2p)) and (action eq allow)
entry.description: Internet traffic destined to Internet that cannot be determined (unknown-tcp, unknown-udp, unknown-p2p)

entry.name: Outbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.caption: Outbound File UPLD by Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET)) and (direction eq client-to-server)
entry.description: Internal Clients Uploading Files to the Internet

entry.name: Outbound Dest Countries
entry.caption: Outbound Dest Countries
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Internal traffic initiating successful connections to Destination Countries

entry.name: Outbound Dest Countries-Apps
entry.caption: Outbound Dest Countries-Apps
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq allow) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (dstloc neq 'US') and (app neq dns)
entry.description: Internal traffic initiating successful connections to the internet and the Apps they are using

entry.name: Outbound Allowd Viruses
entry.caption: Outbound Allowd Viruses
entry.query: ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus)) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (action eq alert)
entry.description: Viruses successfully leaving your network

entry.name: Outbound Denied Viruses
entry.caption: Outbound Denied Viruses
entry.query: ((subtype eq virus) or (subtype eq wildfire-virus)) and ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET)) and ((action neq alert ) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Internal viruses denied in to the Internet

entry.name: Outbound Rules wThreat
entry.caption: Outbound Rules wThreat
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Outbound Rules where internal traffic to Internet and being identified by any category in threat log

entry.name: Outbound FileTypes to WildFire
entry.caption: Outbound FileTypes to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: File Types coming from the Internal destined to Internet that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Outbound Apps to WildFire
entry.caption: Outbound Apps to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Identified Applications coming from Internal destined to Internet that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Outbound Rules to WildFire
entry.caption: Outbound Rules to WildFire
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)
entry.description: Outbound Rules coming from the Internal that have an unknown verdict and are sent to WildFire

entry.name: Outbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Allowd Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (subtype eq spyware)
entry.description: Spyware successfully leaving your network

entry.name: Outbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Denied Spyware Rule
entry.query: (((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (direction eq client-to-server)) or ((zone.src eq INTERNET) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.src notin 127.0.0.3) and (zone.dst neq INTERNET) and (direction eq server-to-client))) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow)) and (subtype eq spyware)
entry.description: Internal Spyware denied to the Internet

entry.name: Outbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Allowd Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET)) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Client on your network sending traffic to the internet intended to exploit a vulnerability on the internet.

entry.name: Outbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Denied Vuln C2S Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET)) and (direction eq client-to-server) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Vulnerabilties successfully denied from leaving your network where traffic initiated internal, attacker internal

entry.name: Outbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Allowd Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET)) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action eq alert) or (action eq allow)) and (severity geq medium)
entry.description: Outbound Allowed Server-to-Client traffic where threat log type is classified - vulnerability

entry.name: Outbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.caption: Outbound Denied Vuln S2C Rule
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET)) and (direction eq server-to-client) and (subtype eq vulnerability) and ((action neq alert) and (action neq allow))
entry.description: Vulnerabilties successfully denied from leaving your network where traffic initiated internal, attacker external

entry.name: Outbound URL Cats Quest PANDB
entry.caption: Outbound URL Cats Quest PANDB
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and ((category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq hacking) or (category eq malware) or (category eq parked) or (category eq phishing) or (category eq proxy-avoidance-and-anonymizers) or (category eq questionable))
entry.description: Internal Clients successfully connecting to Internet sites from the following URL categories (dynamic-dns, hacking, malware, parked, phishing, proxy-avoidance-and-anonymizers, or questionable)

entry.name: Outbound URL Cats Denied
entry.caption: Outbound URL Cats Denied
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable) and (action eq block-url)
entry.description: Internal clients attempting to visit denied URL categories

entry.name: Outbound URL Cats Allowed
entry.caption: Outbound URL Cats Allowed
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action neq block-url)
entry.description: Internal clients visiting allowed URL categories

entry.name: Outbound URLs Category Unknown
entry.caption: Outbound URLs Category Unknown
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and (category eq unknown)
entry.description: Internal Clients visiting URLs categorized as unknown

entry.name: Outbound URLs Category Parked
entry.caption: Outbound URLs Category Parked
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and (category eq parked)
entry.description: Internal Clients visiting URLs categorized as parked

entry.name: Outbound URLs Category Dyn-DNS
entry.caption: Outbound URLs Category Dyn-DNS
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and (action eq alert) and (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (category eq dynamic-dns)
entry.description: Internal Clients visiting URLs categorized as dynamic-dns
